title: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: When exporting a zip file, it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state of the table. During this process, a busy cursor should be shown.
OB: During the update process, a busy cursor is not shown and it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds) for the checked state of the table to be updated.
EB: During the update process, a busy cursor should be shown and it should only take a short amount of time (a few seconds) for the checked state of the table to be updated.
SR:
1. Open the export zip feature.
2. Select multiple items to be exported.
3. Wait for the update process to complete.
4. Observe if a busy cursor is shown and how long it takes for the checked state of the table to be updated.
